TextView.android:text: Q) What are the features of the app?

The app offers an interactive solution for your mental health and general well being concerns. You can update your mood, consult with practitioners in real time and get a list of suggestive solutions for your every concern.
Q) How do i Get started in the app?
You will have to register and create a profile on the app, this can be done via your email and number, making it easy to log in and save information later.
Q) How relevant is the information on the app?
The information is provided by certified, experienced professionals and is updated constantly to ensure that it is relevant.
Q) Is it possible to fix an appointment for consultation via the app?
Undoubtedly you could do it at ease, all that you need is a good speed internet connection. Besides booking appointments, you can now read Cureyaâ€™s enlightening posts about health through the app.
Q) Will I be able to cancel the appointment on the day of the consultation?

You will be able to cancel but you will have to do it at least 2 hours before the time of appointment, else you will receive only 80% of the total amount paid. Itâ€™s better to plan wisely before scheduling an appointment so we can avoid any confusion. We value both your and our expertâ€™s time.
Q) Can I reschedule my appointment via the app?
Yes, we know your situation so we have designed our app in such a way that -within a few minutes you can reschedule it.
Q) Is there a special membership program available at a discounted price?
Yes, there is an excellent membership program going on for a limited period. Please check the membership tab on the home screen to know the benefits, pricing, duration, etc.
Q) Will this track my personal information?

No! We do not track your personal information, your login data is saved for your convenience which can be switched off. Do note that any information you share with us is not shared further with any third party sites, and privacy is maintained with our encryption.
Q) I have multiple accounts. Which account should I use?

When you install the app, the window for choosing your login account will pop up, we recommend you using an active email ID, Once chosen login using the same email id as your profile is saved with an email
Q) Can I change my password?

Yes! You can change your password. Click on your profile settings and select the option that indicates reset password. You should receive an email on your registered email with instructions to proceed further.
Q) Can I share my account with others?
No, your account will not be shared further with others. One email is for one account. The algorithm sorts solutions to be personalized and individualized, making each person's experience unique.
Q)Does the app track cookies and cache?
No the app does not track cookies and cache, you can disable the same in your mobile settings.
Q) Do I need an internet connection for the app?
Yes! To launch the app, you will require a stable internet connection.
Q) Why isnâ€™t the page loading correctly on my device?

Ensure strong network connectivity and update your device to the latest iOS/Android software. Refresh and try again, it should load correctly. If you are still facing an issue, try uninstalling and reinstalling the app.
Q) I have network connection, but the app is not loading
Update your device to the latest iOS/Android software. Refresh and try again, it should load correctly. If you are still facing an issue, try uninstalling and reinstalling the app.
Q) Do I have to pay a download fee?
No! You can download and install the app on the itunes/playstore for free.
Q) What payment methods are accepted for in app purchases?
Payments are accepted from all gateways, Credit/Debit card and UPI
Q) The payment got debited from my account however, it doesnâ€™t reflect in the app- how long will it take to reflect?
Donâ€™t panic, there may be a delay in the serverâ€™s response. It may take 3 business days to get reflected. We will notify you via the app, right after we receive the payment.
Q) If I cancel an appointment/ medicine order how long will it take to receive the refund?
We will initiate the refund process, soon after you cancel the appointment/product. At the same time, you may receive the refund within 3 to 5 business days from the day of cancellation.
Q) Is there a free consultation session available & can I enroll for it via the app?
Cureya organizes free consultations for different issues like mental health, Obesity, PCOD, etc. Users can enjoy free sessions in the ratio of one free session per user.
Q) What are the benefits of buying a membership of Cureya?
You can enjoy reduced consultation prices for a specific number of months(say 3 or 6 months) and you could get access to 5 free consultation sessions. You can get discounts on certain medicines too.
Q)Do Discount codes expire?
Yes the discount codes expire, they are only for a limited period of time. You can find the validity below the code.
Q) Discount code is not working?
Discount codes will not work once expired. If used before, they cannot be redeemed again.
Q) How do I get discount codes?
Discount codes can be obtained with frequent purchases. Holiday and festival discount codes are also provided.
Q) How often are there promotions?
Frequently! There are often bundle packages as well as holiday promotions offered.
Q) Can I order medicines via the app?
Yes, you could order medicines seamlessly via our app
Q) What is the minimum amount to purchase medicine via the app?
There is no minimum amount to purchase medicine however, the delivery charges might differ depending on your location.
Q)I am in a different state, how long will it take to deliver medicines to my location?
Other states have a turnaround time of 3 to 5 business days.
Q)Can I book an appointment for a walk-in consultation?
You can do it. If there is a nearby Cureya center in your city. Note that experts are available only for a specific duration of time. If the slot is full, please look for the next available slot.
